Text.Page:
Hail, friend to the sun. The trials of Balderâ€™s Temple grow ever more intense, like the sun as it rises into the midday sky.

Your next trial is to defeat {@LinkCreature:425#3000$$Lagreah}, the Protector of the Garden. Then destroy the {@LinkCreature:425#5000#golem generator} to prove your strength!

You are indeed a friend to the sun.

Your next trial awaits.
